documentation.text:
@notice Emergency withdraws all the pool tokens from chef. In this case there's no reward.
 @param _pid Pool ID which indicates the type of token

addPool(address,uint256,uint256,bool,boo.notice: Add Farm of a specific token

params._fee: the fee to deposit on the pool
params._isLP: is the token an LP token
params._mult: the multiplier the pool will have
params._pidEdit: is it a regular pool or a third party pool ( TRUE = ThirdParty )
params._pidMulEdit: is it a regular pool or a third party pool ( TRUE = ThirdParty )
params._token: the token that will be collected, Taken as address since ThirdParty pools will handle their own logic
params._type: is it a regular pool or a third party pool ( TRUE = ThirdParty )

deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows user to deposit pool token to chef. Transfers rewards to user.

params._amount: Amount of pool tokens to stake
params._pid: Pool ID which indicates the type of token

editChains(bool).notice: Edits the amount of chains to which emissions are split This factor is used in the emissions calculation

editFeeAddress(address,bool).details: remove of contract is achievable by adding the Address 0 to it and setting _isContract to True
editFeeAddress(address,bool).notice: Edit the address used to Receive Fees

params._isContract: if the address is a FeeDistributor Contract

editPoolFee(uint256,uint256).notice: Edits pool fee and updates pools with new params

editPoolMult(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Edits the pool multiplier and updates pools with new params

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Emergency withdraws all the pool tokens from chef. In this case there's no reward.

params._pid: Pool ID which indicates the type of token

getCurrentEmissions(uint256).notice: getCurrentEmissions allows external users to get the current reward emissions It Uses getTimeEmissions to get the current emissions for the pool between last reward emission and current emission

params._pid: Pool Id  from which we need emissions calculated

returns._0: _emissions emissions for the given pool between

massUpdatePools().details: this might be expensive to call...

mintRewards(uint256).notice: This is for Third party pools only. This handles the reward.

params._pid: ID of the third party pool that requests minted rewards

returns._rewardsGiven: Amount of rewards minted to the third party pool

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingRewards(address,uint256).notice: this is for frontend only, calculates the pending reward for a particular user in a specific pool.

params._pid: Pool Id to calculate rewards of

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updatePool(uint256).notice: Update the accRewardPerShare for a specific pool

params._pid: Pool Id to update the accumulated rewards

withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraws pool token from chef. Transfers rewards to user.

params._amount: Amount of pool tokens to withdraw.
params._pid: Pool ID which indicates the type of token
